DOC.brief_summary: This study explore potential rapid onset pain relief drug administration perform epidural needle , technique epidural load provide rapid reliable level labor analgesia without disadvantage combine spinal-epidural , could add valuable new tool anesthesiologist .
DOC.detailed_description: This study explore potential rapid onset pain relief drug administration perform epidural needle , technique epidural load provide rapid reliable level labor analgesia without disadvantage combine spinal-epidural , could add valuable new tool anesthesiologist . Investigators propose conduct single blind , randomize control trial determine difference exists speed onset spread labor analgesia patient receive epidural load dose epidural needle catheter . Group 1 ( Epidural Catheter Administration ) participant receive 10 mL epidural load dose 5 mL increment via epidural catheter follow catheter placement ( current standard practice ) . Group 2 ( Epidural Needle Administration ) participant receive 10 mL epidural load dose 5 mL increment via epidural needle prior catheter placement ( experimental group ) . Various parameter measure time drug administration evaluate blood pressure , heart rate , fetal heart rate . Following delivery , total anesthetic dose , total number dos demand , total number dosage rescue dos , overall patient satisfaction record .
DOC.criteria: 1. subject volunteer consented participation study upon admission labor delivery 2. parturients active labor request epidural analgesia 3. uncomplicated pregnancy reassure fetal heart trace 4. ageâ‰¥18 year 1. contraindication epidural anesthesia 2. inability read , comprehend , sign inform consent form 3. fetal intrauterine growth retardation ( IUGR ) 4. nonreassuring fetal heart trace 5. cervical dilation great 7cm 6. intrauterine fetal demise 7. spinal pathology neurologic disease 8. history chronic pain 9. incarcerated patient 10. patient enrol study evidence dural puncture epidural technique ( > 3 attempt , presence CSF ) .
